item.title: The grass is too high and blocking the view of traffic travelling on the main highway., 13th May
item.description:
The main junction where Withybridge lane meets Tewkesbury road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Beautiful sunshine for days but water still coming up through drain, 13th May
item.description:
From Whitlands Road/Way, towards Endsleigh. Drain is BEFORE what was the Endsleigh offices. Water is escaping the drain, as in coming up through the drain. The weather has been stunning for a few days so it isn't the case of excess water. Also, it's been leaking/expelling water for a few weeks. I kept forgetting to report.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 13th May
item.description:

item.title: Big pothole, 13th May
item.description:
There's a pothole that's gradually widening between the road and the pavement. (right side)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1a, Elmfield Avenue, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fix it properly once, rather than attempting to fix it 20 times poorly, 13th May
item.description:
Again this as the job was done so poorly that anything has cahnge: Elmfield Road, Elmfield Avenue, and Swindon Road are in very bad condition. Every time it rains, enormous puddles form, and you'd better be faster than the cars if you don't want to end up soaked. In the picture, the puddle was of medium size, but it's usually much larger.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3a, Elmfield Avenue, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
